title: Season 7's MMR.
body: Will a hard mmr reset happen?

replies.body: It's almost always a Soft reset. Doubtful they'd change it, but even if they do won't stop me from getting Diamond :)
Doubtful. Most likely a soft reset.

Is this a complaint about DQ or a genuine question? For a hard reset, everyone's MMR is reset to baseline; for a soft reset, everyone's MMR is taken within 1 or 2 standard deviations of baseline - relative to their position at season end 2016. I don't see what Dynamic Badges have to do with it?
